cgcloud__Account_Set__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Set__c
cgcloud__Account_Set__c.description: Represents the object for the creation of Customer Sets.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specific language.

cgcloud__Group_Similar_Stores__c.description: Enables the customer set to group similar stores.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the customer set record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales organization to which the customer set belongs.
